snippet: Investors are increasing their demands that Bank of America repurchase soured mortgages, arguing they were improperly underwritten and sold to them in the first place.
abstract: Investors are increasing their demands that Bank of America repurchase soured mortgages, arguing they were improperly underwritten and sold to them in the first place.

headline.main: Bank of America Posts $2.5 Billion Profit, but Mortgage Woes Remain
headline.print_headline: Profit at Bank of America, But Mortgage Woes Persist
